nirn.name: Pillar of Nirn
nirn.description: Set from Folkreath, creates an AoE with initial hit, applies bleeding on target

tzogvin.name: Tzogvin's Warband
tzogvin.description: Set from Frostvault, gives you <> stacks on each LA, minor force on 10 stacks
tzogvin.usage: Mostly frontbar. You have to do 10 LA to gain minor force, and also increase your crit damage. Replaces trap/acceleration

aegis.name: Aegis Caller
aegis.description: Set from Unhollowed Grave, lesser aegis dealing AoE damage with spinning blades
aegis.usage: Aegis is called from melee critical damage

kinras.name: Kinras's Wrath
kinras.description: Set from Black Drake Villa, applies Major berserk for you and Minor berserk for your group and you
kinras.usage: Mostly frontbar. After 5 LA Major berserk is gained, stacking 5 Burning Heart stacks
